translation.en: He was acting all shifty and shit. Like going through the laundry.
translation.ja: 気持ち悪かったね 洗濯物を あさってた

translation.en: You need to get some groceries, man.
-We have an incredible sale at the store-- -He broke into the house! He had a knife!
translation.ja: 店でセールをしてる 家に押し入ってナイフを

translation.en: Whoa! With the kids there? That's wack!
translation.ja: 子供がいるのに？ ヤバい奴だ
ヤバい奴よ　どうも

translation.en: There were kids there. OK, and what?
He thinks because he's balling Sam, he can come and prank us on our own turf.
translation.ja: サムの彼氏だからって 好き勝手させていいの？

translation.en: Hey, you know what? You're right. Fuck this.
translation.ja: そうだよ　許せない

translation.en: Don't forget the most important part. Fuck Sam.
translation.ja: 忘れないで　サムも潰す

translation.en: Yeah, fuck her. She needs to get her psycho boyfriend in check.
translation.ja: そうだね サイコな彼氏に鎖を
〝救急外来〞 そんなに焦るな

translation.en: -Fill these out and take a seat. -No, I'm just visiting.
translation.ja: 記入して お見舞いに

translation.en: [clears throat] Tell Nurse Beddy she has a patient.
Beddy. Long time, how you been?
translation.ja: ベディ　元気だった？

translation.en: -Still toting around with this moron. -She can't quit me, Beddy. Too pretty!
translation.ja: まだこのバカと？ 俺はかわいいからね

translation.en: I'm sure that you do, but there happens to be a new security protocol.
translation.ja: そうしたいが 管理体制が厳しくなってね

translation.en: We kept coming up short on blueberries and bananas.
translation.ja: ブルーベリーとバナナが 不足してる

translation.en: -So now I need a special key-- -I need to see a patient.
translation.ja: 鍵がないと… 患者に会わせて

translation.en: You want anything from the machine? I'm starving.
translation.ja: 何か食べる？　おなかすいた

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -What do you think?
translation.ja: 〝サニーヴェイル 運動部〞 何の用？ 分からない？

translation.en: -What game? What are you talking about? -[Deena] About your dipshit boyfriend.
translation.ja: ゲームって？ あんたの彼氏から 皆殺しにすると脅された

translation.en: -He threatened, "You're all fucking dead." -That didn't mean anything.
translation.ja: あんたの彼氏から 皆殺しにすると脅された 冗談だよ

translation.en: Now tonight, he's stalking around, messing with us. He broke into the house where Kate was babysitting.
translation.ja: 今夜 私たちをつけ回し ケイトのバイト先に侵入した

translation.en: You need to call him and tell him to back off.
Good news. They're gonna transfer you out of this shithole tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 転院できるってさ

translation.en: Don't look at me, dude. I'm… I'm… I'm broke.
translation.ja: カネなんて持ってない

translation.en: Uh… Uh, no. Uh, but I…
[Sam] He has been with me all night!
-Stop covering for him! He's a bad guy. -You're out of control!
translation.ja: 悪党をかばうの？ どうかしてるよ

translation.en: You put me in the hospital! Now you're here yelling at me--
translation.ja: 私を病院送りにしたくせに

translation.en: OK. No, that was an accident. Look, I got a nosebleed.
translation.ja: あれは事故だったのよ 鼻血が出たから…

translation.en: -I didn't actually mean-- -A nosebleed? Stop making excuses!
translation.ja: 鼻血？　言い訳はやめて

translation.en: So don't blame me when you wake up in ten years just like your dad!
translation.ja: 10年後 パパみたくなっても 私を責めないで

translation.en: Old and drunk and going nowhere!
translation.ja: 酔っ払いの負け犬にね
そっか　地獄に落ちろ

translation.en: Second, yeah. Congrats on getting out of Shadyside, Sam.
translation.ja: シェイディサイドは卒業だね

translation.en: All you had to do was suck it up, literally, and swallow some Sunnyvale--
translation.ja: サニーヴェイルのナニを なめてればいい

translation.en: You know what? I never want to see you again!
translation.ja: もういい　二度と会わない

translation.en: Great. Have a nice goddamn life!
translation.ja: それじゃ楽しい人生を

translation.en: -Where'd you learn how to do this? -Oh, a lot of people trade hacks online.
translation.ja: どこで習ったの？ ネットで情報交換した

translation.en: So, um… [chuckles] …when'd you get into the fruit business?
translation.ja: それで いつからフルーツ業界に？

translation.en: Oh, that's just temporary. Saving up to get out of here.
translation.ja: 一時的なバイトよ 貯金して街を出る

translation.en: -Where are the keys? Do you have the keys? -No!
translation.ja: 車のカギは？　持ってる？

translation.en: -[Deena whispers] No! -You can't wear that mask. What are--
-[Simon] Come on! Let's go! -[Josh] Come on!
translation.ja: こっちだ　早く乗れ

translation.en: [female reporter] Mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified as the killer in the mall massacre.
translation.ja: 犯人はモール従業員の ライアン･トーレスです

translation.en: -[Simon] Deena! Hurry up! Let's go! -[Deena] Go! Go!
translation.ja: ディーナ　急げ 出して

translation.en: -[Simon] We have to go now! -[Deena] Hurry!
[Nick] You have access to the mall. You are still employed there, correct?
translation.ja: お前はモールに入れる 従業員だからな

translation.en: I'mma tell you again. Somebody planted that.
translation.ja: 言っただろ　ハメられたんだ

translation.en: Why would I tag my own place of work? Come on, man!
translation.ja: 自分の職場に落書きするかよ オッサン

translation.en: Martin, around here, people show a little respect. They call me Sheriff Goode.
translation.ja: 口のきき方に気をつけろ “グッド保安官”だ

translation.en: [Deena] I'm telling you, it was him!
The psycho killer my colleague shot dead, huh?
translation.ja: 撃ち殺されたサイコ野郎か？

translation.en: Yes! That's what we keep saying!
You told me to come to you.
We should not be this close to the police station in a stolen ambulance.
translation.ja: 盗難車で警察署に来るなんて

translation.en: Ted Bundy, when he was stalking his victims, I mean.
translation.ja: テッド･バンディは 堂々と女を あさった

translation.en: OK, didn't he get caught though?
-Well, no. Well, yeah, but-- -Figure this out. I'm gonna take a leak.
translation.ja: いや　そうだけど… 話してろ　俺は小便してくる

translation.en: -[Josh sighs] -Why do you know so much about killers?
-You hang onto any of that candy? -[Josh] Yeah.
Yeah. Yeah, the mall killer, Ryan Torres.
translation.ja: モール襲撃犯の ライアンだった

translation.en: I know, but you guys must have made a mistake or something. Look…
translation.ja: 死んだと言うけど 何かの間違いよ

translation.en: Let me get the right paperwork.
Would you say he was more, uh, Dawn of the Dead or Night of the Living Dead?
translation.ja: ゾンビ映画に出てくる 走らないタイプか？

translation.en: -You don't believe us? -This was a waste of time.
translation.ja: 信じないの？ 時間のムダよ

translation.en: We've had prank calls, we've had reports of skeleton mask copycats all weekend.
translation.ja: イタズラ電話が多い 愉快犯も出没してる

translation.en: Got a call from the hospital. Lady sounded worked up.
translation.ja: 病院から緊急の電話です

translation.en: Uh… wait, I'll… I got it. Take care of them.
translation.ja: 出るから こっちを頼む

translation.en: [girl singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
translation.ja: あなたはいつも 　　愛する人を傷つける

translation.en: ♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
translation.ja: 傷つけちゃいけない 　　　　大事な人なのに

translation.en: This is bullshit. There are bodies at the hospital. You're gonna see--
translation.ja: 病院に行けば遺体が見つかる

translation.en: Honey, we are so appreciative of this tip.
translation.ja: 貴重な情報に感謝する

translation.en: -The killer is still out there! -We'll do our damnedest to catch him.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼が野放しよ 警察が捕まえる

translation.en: You're a monster! You're supposed to protect us!
translation.ja: 市民を守るのが仕事でしょ

translation.en: Hey, hey! Young lady, do not test me!
translation.ja: いい加減にしろ 俺をキレさせる気か？

translation.en: [panting] I'm so sorry, sir. I have no idea what came over me.
translation.ja: すみません　頭に血が上って

translation.en: Go find your boyfriends! Tell them you need to relax!
translation.ja: 彼氏でも作って 相手してもらえ
あなたはいつだって同じ
きれいなバラを手に取って

translation.en: ♪ And crush it till the petals fall ♪
translation.ja: 花びらが落ちるまで潰すのよ
大丈夫？　どうかした？

translation.en: Do… do you need help? What the…
translation.ja: 大丈夫？　どうかした？ それは…

translation.en: -[Sam] What are you doing? -[Deena] Just walk, fast.
translation.ja: ディーナ　何なの？ いいから歩いて

translation.en: I think we should stay. We're safe here. What if that psycho shows up again?
translation.ja: ダメだよ サイコ野郎が現れるかも

translation.en: -Then we'll be ready. -[Sam] What the hell?
Is that the cop's? You stole a cop's gun?
-You out of your goddamn mind? -They didn't believe us.
translation.ja: 正気じゃない 警察は当てにならない
警察は当てにならない

translation.en: -[Kate] Come on! -[Simon] Go! Go! Let's go!

translation.ja: 行くよ サム　急げ

translation.en: [Sam] It doesn't make sense. It's… it's not possible.
translation.ja: 撃ったのに 生きてるなんておかしい
撃ったのに 生きてるなんておかしい 分かってる

translation.en: -Who the hell was that? -How the hell should I know? She…
translation.ja: 誰なの？ 俺が知るかよ

translation.en: She was hot! I don't know! The bitch seemed normal!
translation.ja: セクシーだったし 普通に見えたんだ

translation.en: I hate to break it to you, but normal bitches don't bleed black fucking blood!
translation.ja: 普通の女は黒い血を流さない

translation.en: Well, she was hot and normal until she attacked me with a fucking razor blade!
translation.ja: 普通だったのに カミソリで襲いかかられた
待って　カミソリだって？

translation.en: Yeah, for like old-timey shaving, or in this case, I guess, slitting her--
translation.ja: 昔ながらのカミソリだよ たぶんそれで自分の…
彼女は手首を切ったんだ

translation.en: Was she singing something? Was she singing a song, like an oldie… like an oldie song?
translation.ja: 何か歌ってなかった？ 古くさい歌だよ

translation.en: Jesus, Rain Man. How the fuck do you know that?
translation.ja: すごいな なぜそれを知ってる？

translation.en: -[Josh] The girl who attacked you. -[Simon] Holy shit!
translation.ja: 君を襲った女だ 本当だ

translation.en: She sang as she murdered her boyfriend,
translation.ja: 本当だ 彼氏と友達を殺した後 手首を切って自殺した

translation.en: her friends, then she killed herself. Slashed her wrists.
translation.ja: 彼氏と友達を殺した後 手首を切って自殺した

translation.en: Jesus. Yeah, why didn't I see this on the news?
translation.ja: 大事件ね ニュースで流れた？

translation.en: Ruby is one of Shadyside's killers, just like Skull Mask.
translation.ja: 骸骨マスクと同じ殺人鬼だ 骸骨マスクと同じ殺人鬼だ 〝モール殺人事件〞
〝モール殺人事件〞 ライアン　お願い

translation.en: -[Josh] "Masked psycho murders kids at--" -[Kate] Camp Nightwing.
translation.ja: “キャンプ場で…” ナイトウィングね 母の妹も犠牲になった

translation.en: Yeah, my mom's sister was there.
translation.ja: ナイトウィングね 母の妹も犠牲になった

translation.en: That screwed my family up for a long time.
local milkman slashes a bunch of housewives.
translation.ja: 牛乳屋が連続して主婦を殺害
1935年　ハンプティ･ ダンプティ･キラー

translation.en: 1904, Grifter guts girls, and on and on.
translation.ja: 1904年 路上生活者が 少女を殺した

translation.en: It happens in Shadyside over and over. Normal people turn into psychos.
translation.ja: シェイディサイドでは 普通の人間が殺人鬼に

translation.en: 1666. He was the first one recorded.
He, um… killed kids and cut out their eyes.
translation.ja: 子供を殺して目をくりぬいた

translation.en: -I always liked this sweater. -Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: 好きなセーター 知ってる

translation.en: If you get blood on it, I'll kill you.
There are people trying to kill us.
Dead people, if you believe my weirdo brother.
translation.ja: 弟によれば死んだ殺人鬼よ

translation.en: Look, I know I always give you shit for pretending you're someone you're not, but it's…
translation.ja: 自分を偽ってるって いつもあなたを責めるけど

translation.en: It's not really easy for me to…
you know, be like us… either.
translation.ja: こういう恋は簡単じゃない

translation.en: -Are you giving me a pass? -[chuckles] No.
translation.ja: 私の言い分を認める？ いいえ

translation.en: Fine. I'm not gonna say what I was gonna say.
translation.ja: それじゃ何も言わない

translation.en: I mean, here we are. We're together for one night and--
translation.ja: 私たちが一緒に過ごしたら…

translation.en: Dead people are trying to kill us.
translation.ja: 死人に殺されそうになる

translation.en: No one actually thinks that this witch shit is real.
translation.ja: 魔女の呪いの話なんて…

translation.en: Yeah, it's something babysitters make up to scare kids.
translation.ja: 子供を怖がらせる作り話だ

translation.en: No, no. Just listen to me.
1666, Sarah Fier was hanged for witchcraft, fact.
translation.ja: 1666年 サラ･フィアーは 魔女として処刑された

translation.en: But ever since she was executed, she's been possessing people, turning them into killers, to take revenge on the town.
translation.ja: だから住民に憑(と)りついて 殺人を犯させ街に復讐してる

translation.en: -[Simon] It's like the nursery rhyme. -[Josh] Yeah. Yeah.
[Simon] "Before the witch's final breath, she found a way to cheat her death."
translation.ja: “魔女は息を引き取る前 己の死を偽装した”

translation.en: "By cutting off her cursed hand, she kept her grip upon our land."
translation.ja: “この世にしがみつくために 魔女は手首を切り落とす”

translation.en: to make good men her wicked slaves."
Don't you see what's happening to us? This is all proof.
translation.ja: 今夜のことで分かった 証拠もある

translation.en: Shadyside isn't just some hotbed for psychos. All these massacres are connected to Sarah Fier.
translation.ja: シェイディサイドの殺人は サラ･フィアーが操ってる

translation.en: Fine. Let's assume that the witch has been possessing people for some sort of messed-up vendetta.
translation.ja: 魔女が復讐のために 住民に憑りついてるとして

translation.en: This isn't the same as the mall massacre. Something different is happening to us. Something way worse.
translation.ja: 私たちに起きてることは もっとヤバいよ

translation.en: OK, we have two of her killers after us and both of them are dead.
translation.ja: 襲ってきた殺人鬼は ２人とも死んでるし

translation.en: Why is she so mad at us?
I don't know, you know. I thought I hit my head…
translation.ja: 頭を打ったせいだと思ってた
でもあれは彼女だった

translation.en: I can't believe you're wearing that.
Can't believe you're above it, when we're in the middle of the fucking woods and dead maniacs are after us.
translation.ja: 死んだ殺人鬼に追われて 深夜の森に入るからね

translation.en: OK, so I fell out of the car…

translation.ja: ウソでしょ 大変だ

translation.en: This is bad! This is really bad!
No wonder the witch is pissed at us. I'd be pissed too. Sam disturbed her grave.
translation.ja: 魔女が怒るはずよ サムは墓を荒らした

translation.en: [sighs] Now she's sending her henchmen after us.
translation.ja: だから殺人鬼に追わせた

translation.en: As in every one of those sickos on your wall is coming after us?
translation.ja: 殺人鬼が全員 私たちを狙う？

translation.en: [Simon] Hold up. Hold up. She's mad because we disturbed her grave, right?
translation.ja: 待てよ　墓を荒らしたから 怒ってるんだろ？
元どおりに戻せばいい

translation.en: Just put the bones back, rebury them, and put her to rest!
translation.ja: 骨を埋め直して安眠させる

translation.en: Whatever. Let's do it quickly so we can go.
Deena, Deena! Find something to wrap her bones!
translation.ja: ディーナ　骨を包むものを

translation.en: I think there's someone in the woods!
-That was the Camp Nightwing Killer! -That was a bust!
translation.ja: ナイトウィングの犯人だ 失敗？

translation.en: Yeah, maybe because it's not like the movies, OK?
translation.ja: 現実は映画とは違うんだよ

translation.en: It's not as easy as putting bones to rest!
-It should've worked. It always works! -[Josh] Maybe it's her missing hand.
translation.ja: いつだって効果はある 手がないから

translation.en: Who gives a shit? It doesn't matter. Hey, how do I not die?
translation.ja: とにかく私は死にたくない

translation.en: [Simon] We! How do we not die!
And I'm looking at you, witch nerd!
-I… I don't know! -They're not coming for us!
translation.ja: 分からないよ 私たちじゃない

translation.en: -I saw her again… -[woman whispers] It's you.
translation.ja: また見たの お前だ

translation.en: The witch. She… I disturbed her grave.
translation.ja: 私が彼女の墓を 荒らしたからよ
お前だ 私に怒ってる

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Nightwing ran right by me.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼は僕の脇を素通りした

translation.en: I jumped out his way, it was like he didn't even see me. He went for her.
translation.ja: 僕が見えてないみたいに サムを狙った
ルビーはサイモンを襲った

translation.en: Skull Mask came after us at home. And while you guys were babysitting!
translation.ja: それに骸骨マスクは 私たちを狙った

translation.en: No, he didn't. Skull Mask didn't care about us.
translation.ja: 骸骨マスクの狙いは 私たちじゃない
狙ったのはサムの血よ

translation.en: Yeah! From the crash when Sam puked period!
translation.ja: 事故の時 サムが吐いた血だ

translation.en: It's Jaws, dude! A shark smelling blood!
translation.ja: サメは血のにおいをたどる

translation.en: [panting] Kate's right! When we found Skeletor,
he was all sniffy and weird with my shirt like a perv in a pantie shop!
translation.ja: 俺のシャツの においを嗅いでた

translation.en: Yeah, but he came to our house too!
[Simon] Sam bled on her bones, now the witch wants more of her blood!
translation.ja: 魔女はサムの血を欲してる

translation.en: OK, so what do they do in Jaws?
They didn't go skinny-dipping with the goddamn bait.

translation.ja: そうだ　サムは餌だよ

translation.en: Seriously, if we're right and they're after her…
translation.ja: 本当に サムを狙ってるなら⸺

translation.en: let's give these assholes what they want.
You can't have any of Sam's blood on you.
Well, not much I can do about that.
Deena, you have to get clean too! Not a single drop, OK?
translation.ja: ディーナも きれいに洗い落とせ

translation.en: I don't want to go in by myself.
[whispering] Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.ja: 上上 下下 左右左右 ＢＡ スタート

translation.en: OK, well, fine or not, we s… still need to cover it.
translation.ja: あなたが平気だとしても 何とかしなきゃ

translation.en: [Kate] Do you really think this is going to work?
When I went to Sunnyvale, I ran away from you.
translation.ja: サニーヴェイルに引っ越し あなたから逃げた

translation.en: this reminder. I was scared of this.
translation.ja: あなたを見てると 怖くなったのよ

translation.en: And, like, tonight's been the first time I've felt like myself in… months.
translation.ja: でも今夜は数ヵ月ぶりに 本当の自分でいられた

translation.en: I forgot what that… what that felt like.
translation.ja: こんな気持ちだったって

translation.en: You make me feel… like me.
translation.ja: あなたとなら 自分らしくいられる

translation.en: -♪ Wouldn't turn around and break it… ♪ -[Kate] Make sure my back is clean.
-You're gonna have to look at me. -♪ And anyone who's ever played a part ♪
What if tonight's it for us?
[Kate] Calm down. It was barely first base.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて　キスだけよ

translation.en: Did you… all go to pound town?
[Josh] The killers go to the blood.
Smile, you son of a bitch!
translation.ja: 笑いやがれ　クソ野郎

translation.en: Are you sure you want to do this?
See you on the other side.
[Ruby Lane singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
translation.ja: あなたはいつも 　　愛する人を傷つける

translation.en: ♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
translation.ja: 傷つけちゃいけない 　　　　大事な人なのに

translation.en: Dude! She's here! I saw her!
She was… She was so sexy, but fucking crazy still!
translation.ja: セクシーだったけど やっぱりイカれてる

translation.en: She was doing it! Following the blood trails!
It's working. Skull Mask freak, three o'clock.
If this doesn't work, I will murder you!

translation.ja: 来るよ 止められない

translation.en: No, no! We are not fucked!
translation.ja: 私たちは終わってない

translation.en: She's fucked. They're coming for her.
translation.ja: サムは終わった　狙われてる

translation.en: If we put Sam in the hall, we end this now.

translation.ja: ひどすぎる 現実的なのよ

translation.en: A bullet won't stop them, fine. They're really strong.
translation.ja: 銃じゃ勝てないのは 分かってる

translation.en: But we just tried to goddamn explode them, and that didn't work!
translation.ja: 吹き飛ばしたのに生き返った

translation.en: I mean, that's not exactly what she's saying.
You'd let us all die to protect her. Look at this.
translation.ja: 彼女を守れば私たちが死ぬ

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Kate's right. I don't want you guys to die for me.
translation.ja: ケイトの言うとおり みんなは生きて

translation.en: Let me go! Let me… Sam!
[Deena] Let me go. Let me go!

translation.ja: 〝生存者は 「魔女を見た」と〞 お願い

translation.en: -[Sam] What… what… what is going on? -[Kate] You're not doing this alone.
translation.ja: どういうこと？ 独りで死なせない

translation.en: [Sam] Camp Nightwing. Summer of '78. Group of campers, brutal massacre.
translation.ja: 1978年 ナイトウィングで キャンパーが惨殺された

translation.en: There was one Shadyside survivor, C. Berman.
translation.ja: バーマンは生き残った

translation.en: "The still traumatized girl claims that amidst the carnage she saw the witch."
translation.ja: “混乱した少女は 魔女を見たと証言した”

translation.en: Yeah, just like you. So, if she survived, I'm pretty sure--
translation.ja: 君と同じだ 彼女が助かったなら…

translation.en: There may be a way for me to live too.
[Kate] I got it! C. Berman! 9006 Brennan Way.
translation.ja: 見つけた Ｃ･バーマンの住所よ
出ない バーマンです　留守に…

translation.en: -I'm not home right now. -I need some help here!
translation.ja: バーマンです　留守に… 誰か手を貸せ

translation.en: -Please leave a message after the beep. -No one's there!
Hello, my name is Deena Johnson. I think you saw the witch.
translation.ja: ディーナ･ジョンソンです 魔女を？

translation.en: This shit is not gonna hold!
We need to know how you survived!
Hey! We're being attacked, alright? There are killers here!
translation.ja: 殺人鬼に襲われてます

translation.en: If you're there, please pick up! Please answer!
-To record a new message, press one. -Fuck! No!
translation.ja: メッセージの録音は… クソッタレ

translation.en: What? No, she's alive. That's the whole point.
translation.ja: 生き残ったはずでしょ

translation.en: Yeah, she… she survived, but… but first she died.
translation.ja: 生き残ったけど一度は死んだ

translation.en: [Deena] "C. Berman was found in the woods." "Her heart had stopped but local boy performed CPR."
translation.ja: “心肺停止で発見されたが 蘇生法で助かった”

translation.en: What if that's how she survived? Her heart stopped.
translation.ja: 心臓が止まったから 生き残れた

translation.en: What is it? The fucking rhyme. The fucking rhyme!
translation.ja: あの歌よ どんな歌詞だった？

translation.en: "She'll take your blood, she'll take your head!"
translation.ja: “血を奪い 頭を奪い 追ってくる”
“血を奪い 頭を奪い 追ってくる” “死ぬまで”

translation.en: -[pounding continues] -It's just like Kate said. OK? The witch wants you dead.
translation.ja: 魔女はあなたの死を望んでる

translation.en: And then, just like this C. Berman bitch, we bring you back to life.
translation.ja: それからバーマンみたいに 生き返らせる

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm dying tonight one way or another.
translation.ja: やって どっちみち死ぬんだから

translation.en: Let's try to bring me back.
A few months ago, my brother Timothy had an unfortunate experience
translation.ja: 数ヵ月前 ティモシーは 実験に失敗した

translation.en: in which he ingested too much of a certain substance.
translation.ja: あるドラッグを過剰摂取して

translation.en: He was dead for two minutes.
translation.ja: ２分間 心臓が止まったんだ

translation.en: You need to take these in order. Pile one takes the edge off.
translation.ja: 順番を守って飲むんだ 最初の山を飲めば ユニコーンとヤってる気分だ

translation.en: You're gonna feel like you're being fucked by a unicorn.
translation.ja: 最初の山を飲めば ユニコーンとヤってる気分だ

translation.en: Pile two is gonna bring your core temp way down. You may feel slightly sick.
translation.ja: 次の山を飲むと体温が下がり 気分が悪くなる

translation.en: You need to take a five-minute interval between pile two and pile three.
translation.ja: ５分 待ってから 最後の山を飲む

translation.en: That's really important, OK? Pile three brings you down and out, so take that "take five" or it's all gonna go to shit!
translation.ja: これで心臓が止まるが ５分待たないと効果ない

translation.en: -How many do we have? -Tons. Like a thousand.
This is what brings her back. This is Jesus!
translation.ja: これで生き返らせる　復活だ
サムの血で印をつける

translation.en: Remember half an hour ago, when you wanted to murder me? You don't have to do this. You can leave.
translation.ja: さっきは私を殺そうとした 無理せず逃げていいのよ

translation.en: Remember when you decided to sacrifice yourself for us?
translation.ja: 自分だけ犠牲になるつもり？

translation.en: OK, I got stock room. You take the emergency exit.
translation.ja: 俺は倉庫　君は非常口

translation.en: Whoa! No, no, no! Splitting up is not a good idea at all.
translation.ja: 分かれるのは危険だよ

translation.en: But, dude, listen to me. I know that this is all fucked, but… we gotta do this.
translation.ja: こんなのヤバすぎるが 俺たちがやるしかない

translation.en: She doesn't have time for most people.
translation.ja: ムダな付き合いはしない

translation.en: She's being nice because we're probably gonna die.
translation.ja: 死ぬ前にお情けでキスを…

translation.en: maybe we're gonna die, but Kate is not nice.
translation.ja: 死ぬかもしれないけど お情けじゃない
だから？ だから君も自信を持て

translation.en: We would not be this far if it weren't for you.
translation.ja: 君がいたから ここまでやれた

translation.en: Now we have to keep those psychos away from Sam.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼を サムから遠ざけるんだ

translation.en: So go… [slaps shoulder] …man up, and check that exit.
translation.ja: 男なら覚悟を決めて 非常口を調べてこい

translation.en: What if we fuck up and just kill me?
What if you can't bring me back? [sniffles]
When you left, I saw it all. My whole future,
translation.ja: あなたが去って 自分の未来が見えた

translation.en: my whole life in Shadyside. A night shift, a day shift,
translation.ja: シェイディサイドで 昼も夜も休まず働いて⸺

translation.en: and a million empty beer cans,
But tonight, even though we are in hell,
I feel like I have another chance with you.
translation.ja: あなたと生きられる気がする

translation.en: And I'm not gonna lose you again.
Because you, and we, are the way out.
translation.ja: あなたと私で出口を見つける

translation.en: When this is all over, I am gonna take you on a date.
translation.ja: 全部 片づいたら デートに行こう

translation.en: We're going to eat cheeseburgers and listen to the Pixies,
translation.ja: バーガーを食べて ピクシーズを聴く

translation.en: and make out and have the best night of our goddamn lives.
translation.ja: 堂々とイチャついて 人生で最高の夜を過ごす

translation.en: But right now, you've got to die.
Now, look at me. Look at me.
I am going to bring you back.

translation.ja: お願いよ　早く経って

translation.en: -It's OK. It's OK. -[crying] I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だから ごめんね

translation.en: [Sam] I need to die. I need to die.
translation.ja: 死ななくちゃダメなの

translation.en: [Deena] Do it! Do it! Do it! Come on!
Josh, Josh! Come help me! Get the pens!
translation.ja: ジョシュ　エピペンをお願い

translation.en: Help me! Go get the EpiPens!
translation.ja: エピペンを持ってきて

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
It has to work! It has to.
I will not let you do this.
translation.ja: あなたは逝(い)かせないよ

translation.en: [grunting] Come on, Sam. Come on. Come on, Sam!

translation.ja: 大丈夫よ　もう終わった
ディーナ･ジョンソンの聴取

translation.en: We were picking up Sam's prescription.
translation.ja: サムの処方箋を取りに行った

translation.en: And the lights went out. It was pitch black.
translation.ja: 電気が消えて真っ暗になった

translation.en: We hid until it was over.
[Nick] You had 15 stitches in your shoulder.
Sam, you look like a ghost. Like you just came back from the dead.
translation.ja: 顔が青い 生き返った幽霊みたいだ

translation.en: I'll tell you what the facts tell me.
translation.ja: 現場の証拠から ジャンキーが…
現場の証拠から ジャンキーが… ケイトとサイモン？

translation.en: They're to blame for everything. That feels too easy to me.
translation.ja: ２人を犯人とするのは 短絡的すぎるが

translation.en: But that's the story this department will go with
translation.ja: それが警察の公式見解だ

translation.en: unless you can help me to see it differently.
translation.ja: 事実と違うなら話して
シェイディサイドの悲劇ね

translation.en: An underprivileged overachiever with bright prospects.
translation.ja: 貧乏だけど 夢にあふれた優等生と⸺

translation.en: A guy who's been supporting his family alone since he was 15.
translation.ja: 15歳の時から独りで 家族を支えてきた勤労青年

translation.en: Both succumbing to the quick cash of drugs.
translation.ja: ドラッグで手早く お金を稼ごうとした

translation.en: [Nick] You came here for my help. I should have listened to you. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 君が署に来た時 話を聞くべきだった

translation.en: But there's nothing else to say.
Do you want your friends going down for this?
Oh, OK. So I'm a bad guy because I'm in here.
translation.ja: 警察署にいる俺は悪党か？

translation.en: Then that makes you a bad guy, too, little man.
translation.ja: だったら お前も悪党だな

translation.en: [female reporter 1] More death in Shadyside. A drug-fueled night of violence leaves a trail of bodies.
translation.ja: シェイディサイドで 薬物が原因の暴力事件です

translation.en: [female reporter 2] There are three dead at East Union Medical…
translation.ja: 病院で３人が殺されました
あなたに… これを渡したかったの

translation.en: I wanted to give you this the other day.
translation.ja: これを渡したかったの

translation.en: But you don't have to open it right now.
translation.ja: 別に今 開けなくても… 別に今 開けなくても… 〝サム　今も愛してる これからもずっと〞
自分で夕食を注文したの？

translation.en: Yeah, it's not a big deal. Just some pizza.
Alright. Listen, asshole. Don't call here--
-[whispering voice echoes] Sam… -[woman] You called me.
translation.ja: サム どうやって生き残ったか 尋ねたでしょ

translation.en: Wanted to know how I survived the Camp Nightwing Massacre.
translation.ja: どうやって生き残ったか 尋ねたでしょ

translation.en: [C. Berman] Did you touch the bones? Did you see her face?
translation.ja: 骨に触った？　顔を見たの？
もう終わった 終わった？

translation.en: Yeah, but, uh… thanks for your prompt reply.
translation.ja: ええ　でもご連絡ありがとう

translation.en: -[C. Berman] It's not over. -[whispering voice] Sam…
[C. Berman] But you haven't stopped her. You can't.
translation.ja: でも彼女は止められない

translation.en: [C. Berman] She'll do whatever it takes.
translation.ja: 彼女は何としても 望みを果たす

translation.en: ♪ And gave it to the rich, yeah ♪
♪ And let the martyrs stretch, yeah ♪
translation.ja: “いろいろあった” “知ってる” “病院とスーパーで 殺人事件があった”

translation.en: ♪ Singing one more time around Might do it ♪
translation.ja: “病院とスーパーで 殺人事件があった” “今回は魔女じゃない”
“今回は魔女じゃない” “ジャンキーの仕業だ”
“ウソだ そんな人たちじゃない”
しっかりして　私よ
サムが自分を見失ってる

translation.en: We have to get her back.
I'm going to get you back.
I thought there was a way to end it.
translation.ja: いつか終わると思った

translation.en: ["School's Out" playing] ♪ School's out for summer… ♪
